member.name: T:SilverlightFX.Services.CompletionService`1
member.summary: This class represents the base class for implementing services that are invoked to request information about items to show in an AutoComplete UI on the client. The service is implemented as an HTTP handler (.ashx).
member.typeparam: The type of items returned from the service.

member.name: M:SilverlightFX.Services.CompletionService`1.GetCompletionItems(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the list of items corresponding to the supplied prefix text that has been entered by the user in an auto-complete UI.
member.param: The prefix text to be matched.
